00013 using namespace itpp;

00015 void mexFunction(int n_output, mxArray *output[], int n_input, const mxArray *input[])
00016 {
00017     // Check the number of inputs and output arguments
00018     if(n_output!=2) mexErrMsgTxt("Two outputs required!");
00019     if(n_input!=6) mexErrMsgTxt("Six inputs required!");
00020     
00021     // Convert input variables to IT++ format
00022     vec intrinsic_coded = mxArray2vec(input[0]);
00023     vec apriori_data = mxArray2vec(input[1]);
00024     bmat bin_gen = mxArray2bmat(input[2]);
00025     vec scrambler_pattern = mxArray2vec(input[3]);
00026     bool tail = (mxArray2double(input[4])==1);
00027     std::string map_metric = mxArray2string(input[5]);
00028     
00029     // ------------------ Start of routine ---------------------------
00030     tr::SISO siso; 
00031     siso.set_generators(bin_gen);
00032     siso.set_scrambler_pattern(scrambler_pattern);
00033     siso.set_tail(tail);
00034     siso.set_map_metric(map_metric);
00035     vec extrinsic_data;
00036     vec extrinsic_coded;
00037     siso.nsc(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded, apriori_data);
00038     // ------------------ End of routine -----------------------------
00039     
00040     // Convert the IT++ format to Matlab format for output
00041     output[0] = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(1, extrinsic_coded.length(), mxREAL);
00042     vec2mxArray(extrinsic_coded, output[0]);
00043     output[1] = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(1, extrinsic_data.length(), mxREAL);
00044     vec2mxArray(extrinsic_data, output[1]);
00045 }
